verses.text: \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brother Aaron \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* brother Aaron \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w harden|strong="H7185"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* though \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w My|strong="H7235"\w* signs \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w in|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* land \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* acts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8201"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* divisions \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w eighty|strong="H8084"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w eighty-three|strong="H8084"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H8141"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.
\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron,

“\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w tells|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, ‘\w Perform|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w miracle|strong="H4159"\w*,’ \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, ‘\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8577"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w went|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. Aaron \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w officials|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8577"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* magic arts.

Each \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w*, \w and|strong="H4294"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8577"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* Aaron’s \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* other \w staffs|strong="H4294"\w*.

Still, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w*, \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* unyielding; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuses|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w walking|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w Wait|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snake|strong="H5175"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* say \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*: \w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w By|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* stink, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* unable \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w its|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.’”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H3605"\w* Aaron, ‘\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w canals|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* ponds \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reservoirs|strong="H4723"\w*—\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.’ \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* stone.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H5650"\w*, Aaron \w raised|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w* smelled \w so|strong="H4480"\w* bad \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* magic \w arts|strong="H3909"\w*. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w around|strong="H6437"\w*, \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H6547"\w* \w his|strong="H7896"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7896"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w passed|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*.
